contextId.occurrenceNote: Here "sea to sea" and "the north to the east" represent all of the land of Israel. Alternate translation: "They will wander here and there and search all over for the word of Yahweh" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-merism]])
contextId.glQuote: They will stagger from sea to sea; they will run from the north to the east to seek the word of Yahweh
